Function read_init_netcdf¶

  • Defined in File program_io.h

Function Documentation¶

int read_init_netcdf(std::vector<double> &y_init, nc_parameters_t &nc_params, size_t &lenp, reference_quantities_t &ref_quant, const char *input_file, const uint32_t traj, model_constants_t &cc)¶

Read initial values from the netcdf file and stores them to y_init. Also stores the amount of trajectories in the input file to lenp and several quantities to cc such as the number of steps to simulate and to nc_params, which is used to read from netcdf files.

Return

Errorcode (0=no errors; 1=simulation breaking error)

Parameters

  • y_init: Array of num_comp many doubles

  • nc_params: Struct used for reading netcdf files

  • lenp: On out: Number of trajectories available

  • ref_quant: Reference quantities used to change from netcdf units to simulation units

  • input_file: Path to input netcdf file as char array

  • traj: ID of input trajectory to read

  • cc: Model constants. On out: Added number of simulation steps
